author: The Film Theorists
description:
*🤫 Something new is coming soon…* ► https://www.theoryverse.store

So what if Gru actually DID steal the moon? What would happen to the planet? Could he even get away with it? We’ll be analyzing this seemingly innocent plot from Despicable Me to show how this crime could have possibly ended life on this very planet…

title: Film Theory: What If Gru ACTUALLY Stole the Moon?
